vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a TH-3(A) Townhouse Subdistrict and a resolution accepting deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant on property zoned R-5(A) Single Family Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 595, the South Dallas Fair Park Special Purpose District, on the north corner of Myrtle Street and Marburg Street
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval 
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant
Z245-208(LC) / Z-25-000036
